metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26490 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: st21nfca_connectivity_event_received in drivers/nfc/st21nfca/se.c in theLinux kernel through 5.16.12 has EVT_TRANSACTION buffer overflows becauseof untrusted length parameters.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
